changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur l'affichage d: Fixed a problem with the display of images and models
changelog.md.Correction d'une erreur 500 lors de la r: Correction of an error 500 when raising the battery value
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug si le niveau de log: Correction of a bug if the log level is none

index.md.Plugin permettant d'utiliser le protocol: Plugin to use the Edisio protocol with Jeedom
index.md.Le plugin edisio permet de dialoguer ave: The edisio plugin allows you to communicate with all the peripherals compatible with the edisio USB module
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il vous: After downloading the plugin, you just need to activate it and set the port to auto
index.md.Après sauvegarde le démon devrait se lan: After saving the demon should launch
index.md.Le plugin est déjà configuré par défaut: The plugin is already configured by default; you don't have to do anything more
index.md.Cependant vous pouvez modifier cette con: However you can modify this configuration
index.md.Voici le détail (certains paramètres peu: Here is the detail (some parameters may only be visible in expert mode)
index.md.cette partie vous donne le statut des dé: this part gives you the status of the dependencies, if they are not OK you can either launch them by hand or wait 5 min, Jeedom will launch them by itself
index.md.cette partie vous donne le statut du dém: this part gives you the status of the demon (both local and remote), if it is not OK you can either launch it by hand or wait 5 min, Jeedom will launch it by itself
index.md.cette partie permet de configurer les pa: This part allows you to configure the general parameters of the plugin
index.md.permet de donner une liste d'identifiant: allows to give a list of edisio identifiers to Jeedom so that it does not create the corresponding equipment
index.md.Les identifiants doivent être séparés pa: Identifiers must be separated by spaces
index.md.paramètres de configuration locale (ou d: local configuration parameters (or remote, depending on the title) of the daemon
index.md.le port USB sur lequel votre interface e: the USB port on which your edisio interface is connected
index.md.Si vous ne savez pas quel port USB est u: If you do not know which USB port is used, you can simply indicate "Auto
index.md.Port socket interne (modification danger: Internal socket port (dangerous modification, must be the same value on all Jeedom deported edisio)
index.md.permet de modifier le port de communicat: allows to modify the internal communication port of the daemon
index.md.A ne changer que si vous savez ce que vo: Change only if you know what you are doing
index.md.Pour lancer le démon en debug il suffit: To launch the daemon in debug it is enough at the level of the configuration of the logs of the plugin to put in debug, to save and to restart the daemon
index.md.Dans ce mode, le démon est très bavard: In this mode, the demon is very talkative
index.md.Une fois le debug terminé, il ne faut pa: Once the debug is finished, don't forget to click on "Restart" to exit the debug mode
index.md.La configuration des équipements edisio: The configuration of edisio equipment is accessible from the plugin menu
index.md.Voilà à quoi ressemble la page du plugin: This is what the page of the edisio plugin looks like (here with 4 devices already)
index.md.Comme à beaucoup d'endroit sur Jeedom, m: As in many places on Jeedom, putting the mouse on the far left allows a quick access menu to appear (you can always leave it visible in your profile)
index.md.un bouton pour créer un équipement manue: a button to manually create an equipment
index.md.un bouton pour passer en inclusion: a button to switch to inclusion
index.md.un bouton pour afficher la configuration: a button to display the configuration of the plugin
index.md.un bouton qui vous donne l'état de santé: a button that gives you the health status of all your Edisio equipment
index.md.enfin en dessous vous retrouvez la liste: finally below you find the list of your equipment
index.md.Une fois que vous cliquez sur l'un d'eux: Once you click on one of them, you get
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.l'id de votre sonde (à ne modifier qu'en: the ID of your probe (to be changed only knowingly)
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.les catégories de l'équipement (il peut: equipment categories (it can belong to several categories)
index.md.indique à Jeedom de ne pas vous alerter: tells Jeedom not to alert you if the equipment sends a low battery frame (some modules do not handle this info correctly and generate false alerts)
index.md.le délai maximum autorisé entre 2 messag: the maximum time allowed between 2 messages before Jeedom declares the equipment as a timeout
index.md.Attention ce paramètre nécessite d'avoir: Attention this parameter requires having configured the option "Force the repetition of messages every (min)" and it must be greater than this value
index.md.vous permet de mettre des commentaires s: allows you to put comments on the equipment (ex
index.md.pile changée le XX\/XX\/XXXX): battery changed on XX / XX / XXXX)
index.md.permet de définir le modèle de votre équ: allows you to define the model of your equipment (to be configured only for manual creation of equipment, in automatic Jeedom configures this field alone)
index.md.vous donne la date de création de l'équi: gives you the date of creation of the equipment
index.md.vous donne la date de dernière communica: gives you the date of last communication with the equipment (can be empty in the case of a socket for example)
index.md.statut de l'équipement (peut être timeou: equipment status (can be timeout for example)
index.md.En dessous vous retrouvez la liste des c: Below you find the list of orders
index.md.le nom affiché sur le dashboard: the name displayed on the dashboard
index.md.la clef de l'information si c'est une in: the information key if it is an info, or the hexadecimal code to send when it is an action
index.md.Les configurations permettent de remplir: The configurations allow these fields to be filled in automatically (you must create the equipment, choose the configuration then save)
index.md.Valeur de retour d'état\" et \"Durée ava: Status feedback value "and" Duration before status feedback
index.md.permet d'indiquer à Jeedom qu'après un c: allows to indicate to Jeedom that after a change on the information its value must return to Y, X min after the change
index.md.dans le cas d'un détecteur de présence q: in the case of a presence detector which emits only during a presence detection, it is useful to set for example 0 in value and 4 in duration, so that 4 min after a detection of movement (and s' there has been no news since) Jeedom resets the value of the information to 0 (no more movement detected)
index.md.permet d'afficher la donnée sur le dashb: allows to display the data on the dashboard
index.md.dans le cas du edisio cette case doit to: in the case of edisio this box must always be checked because you cannot query an edisio module
index.md.permet d'afficher la configuration avanc: displays the advanced configuration of the command (logging method, widget, etc.)
index.md.En haut de votre page de configuration p: At the top of your equipment configuration page, you have 3 buttons that allow you to perform certain options
index.md.même principe que pour les commandes, ça: same principle as for the commands, it allows an advanced configuration of the equipment
index.md.L'ajout d'un équipement Edisio est très: Adding Edisio equipment is very simple, you just have to go into inclusion mode and wait for the equipment to send a message, when that is the case Jeedom will tell you that it has included new equipment and will create it automatically
index.md.Vous trouverez la liste des modules comp: You will find the list of compatible modules
